text: As a female celebrity of child - bearing age, Jessica Simpson is dogged by rumors of pregnancy. But, she insists, the reports couldn't be further from the truth. The mother - of - two joked there was no chance she would have a third child. S. on Monday.'We got an IUD, nothing ’ s gon na get in that uterus
